:::Wheeljack:::

::he nods to Vamprah::
Wheeljack: Yes, im Wheeljack.  Since you are infiltrating the Maximal Base, 
we need to give you a foolproof disguise, not just external, but internal as 
well.  Im going to have to disguise your energy signature so the base's 
scanners detect you as a Maximal.  We will also need to give you more Maximal 
appearance, and giving you an alias wouldn't hurt.  Do you agree to all of 
this?

--part1_da.8148aab.2864c903_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
